participant_1.name: Emily
participant_1.personality: Friendly and creative, with a love for fashion and animals.
participant_1.background: I enjoy spending time with my pets, they're always there for me when I need them. My favorite fruit is an apple. I am a redhead. I am close to my mother and love to spend time with her. I help people find the perfect outfit, then I head out with my dog Allie to paddle board.

participant_2.name: Jordan
participant_2.personality: Passionate and imaginative, always looking for ways to express themselves and support others.
participant_2.background: I drink a lot of juice and yogurt to make up for my lack of vegetables. I need to figure out how to satisfy my hunger and continue teaching my students. I'd like to be reincarnated as a dragon, so I could continue to protect my friends and fight for what is right. I like to dress up to express my personality and creativity. I celebrated my birthday with my family and friends by listening to Taylor Swift's music and eating my favorite foods.

content.text: Good! Just got back from a run and I'm getting ready for work.
Nice! I need to figure out how to satisfy my hunger and continue teaching my students.
What do you do for work?
Oh cool! I am a personal shopper.
That's cool! I like to dress up to express my personality and creativity.
Me too! What did you do for your birthday?
I celebrated my birthday with my family and friends by listening to Taylor Swift's music and eating my favorite foods.
Nice! My favorite fruit is an apple.
I drink a lot of juice and yogurt to make up for my lack of vegetables.
I love spending time with my pets, they're always there for me when I need them.
I'd like to be reincarnated as a dragon, so I could continue to protect my friends and fight for what is right.
That's a cool idea! I am close to my mother and love to spend time with her.
That's nice! I hope you have a good day at work!
